author: FARA-Assistant
name: MemberSync
short: Link Discord users to MissionChief members with admin review
description: Users run !verify, approvers review via buttons. Stores Discord<->MC mapping, assigns role, logs, and auto-prunes if user leaves the alliance.
end_user_data_statement: Stores Discord<->MissionChief links locally on your machine (SQLite). No data is sent to third parties.
